column2: text
Glory to the Empire
Camp Grows
You have conquered in the name of the Empire - glory to you - glory to the Empire!
As the Grudgebringers success spreads around the Empire, many seek us out to swell our ranks.
Imperial Reinforcements
Hired Mercenary
You will receive what men, if any, the Emperor can spare for your mission.
This unit will bolster our ranks.
High chance to receive reinforcements in the form of Imperial State Troops or Mercenaries.
Receive one mercenary unit.
Imperial Satellite
A place to rest our weary bones and while the nobles run the settlement, we will defend it.
Retain settlement with limited construction options.
Liberator
You are the breaker of chains and the people rightfully adore you for it.
Fountain of Light
The fountain of Light can heal even the most gravest of injuries ensuring all our troops are fighting fit.
Camp Followers
These men reduce the burden allowing us to cover more ground and eventually those that prove themselves can join our ranks but some seem untrustworthy.
Unit Replacements
These men will replenish our depleted ranks.
